name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Web Test Automation Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development and a strong proficiency in automation testing frameworks such as **Playwright** and **Selenium**. Skilled in leveraging **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Django** for enhanced test automation processes. Proficient in implementing CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and experienced with cloud services including **Azure** and **GCP**. Expertise in functional and performance testing while utilizing **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **RabbitMQ** to support robust backend systems. With a background in creating high-quality APIs with **OpenAPI**, I excel in Agile environments and bring strong problem-solving and communication skills to deliver impactful projects at leading organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
